item.title: Amazon Smart Clock
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Make a perfect morning with Alexa Smart Clock of Amazon. It has many features like alarm clock other device control option we can control room light and fans. It also talk with us when we we want or we were alone.
item.content:encoded: Make a perfect morning with Alexa Smart Clock of Amazon. It has many features like alarm clock other device control option we can control room light and fans. It also talk with us when we we want or we were alone.

item.title: Alexa Personal Assistant
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Alexa is Amazon’s digital assistant. It’s primarily voice-based, and competes with Google Assistant and Apple’s Siri. You can find it on various devices, including smartphones, smart speakers, TVs, and smart displays. It lets you play music and video, check the news and weather, communicate with people, and control a range of smart home accessories.
item.content:encoded: Alexa is Amazon’s digital assistant. It’s primarily voice-based, and competes with Google Assistant and Apple’s Siri. You can find it on various devices, including smartphones, smart speakers, TVs, and smart displays. It lets you play music and video, check the news and weather, communicate with people, and control a range of smart home accessories.

item.title: Smart Navigation system
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: We provide innovative outdoor to indoor location based solutions that fit the requirements of many use cases. We are continuing our innovation in enhancing our platform and applications. InNav is our ready-to-use platform and mobile application that presents a new form of indoor navigation solutions.
item.content:encoded: We provide innovative outdoor to indoor location based solutions that fit the requirements of many use cases. We are continuing our innovation in enhancing our platform and applications. InNav is our ready-to-use platform and mobile application that presents a new form of indoor navigation solutions.

item.title: Smart Vacuum Cleaner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A robotic vacuum cleaner, sometimes called a robotic or a roomba as a generic trademark, is an autonomous robotic vacuum cleaner which has a limited vacuum floor cleaning system combined with sensors and robotic drives with programmable controllers and cleaning routines. Early designs included manual operation via remote control and a "self-drive" mode which allowed the machine to clean autonomously without human control.
item.content:encoded: A robotic vacuum cleaner, sometimes called a robotic or a roomba as a generic trademark, is an autonomous robotic vacuum cleaner which has a limited vacuum floor cleaning system combined with sensors and robotic drives with programmable controllers and cleaning routines. Early designs included manual operation via remote control and a “self-drive” mode which allowed the machine to clean autonomously without human control.

item.title: Lenovo Smart Clock
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Lenovo Smart Clock with Google Assistant is an audio/visual virtual assistant that's designed for your nightstand. Not only will it wake you each morning, this smart clock will also help you organize your new day. At night, you can use it to check the locks, thermostat, or other smart devices you've connected, and even play music as you fall asleep.
item.content:encoded: The Lenovo Smart Clock with Google Assistant is an audio/visual virtual assistant that’s designed for your nightstand. Not only will it wake you each morning, this smart clock will also help you organize your new day. At night, you can use it to check the locks, thermostat, or other smart devices you’ve connected, and even play music as you fall asleep.
